Log:
------------------------- Release 1.4.2.0 ---------------------
Cool new stuff in the video editor: 1. Dublicate, Split and Delete function for any cuts. Press the right mouse button to open cut function menu;
2. Player updated. Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger. And more accurate.
3. Change play position while playing preview.
4. Load \ Unload intro & outro directly from video editor window. Check menu in left top corner of window.
Bonus: Colorized menu! Enable it in preference window (gear icon in right top corner).
Fixed: 1. Set transition for intro. 2. Now selected video cut will magnet only to nearest cuts.
